dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to step into the Infernal Chasm, mortal? What pitiful creature wanders into the domain of flames and shadows?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Morvath, the Eclipse Seeker. I seek power beyond your fiery realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Morvath, a mere shadowborn sorcerer dares challenge the might of Ignis, the Firebrand Salamander? Your arrogance fuels my flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My darkness eclipses your flames; let us see who emerges victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A bold declaration from one who walks the path of shadows. Your darkness will fuel the inferno.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to be consumed by the abyss, Ignis!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it! Let the flames of battle engulf us both!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your hesitation, creature of fire. Retreat now, and I may spare your flames.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hesitation? You underestimate the fire that burns within me! There is no retreat in the heart of a salamander.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a pact of darkness and fire. Join me, Ignis, and together we shall turn this world to ash.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance, you propose? The flames of Ignis do not bend to the shadows of a sorcerer. Begone with your empty words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see the strength in your flames, Ignis. Let us test our powers against a common enemy instead of each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weak words from a shadowed one. Battle is the only language understood in the Infernal Chasm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to challenge you, Ignis. I seek a path through the flames to reach my goal.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A seeker who treads cautiously in the realm of fire. Your path is paved with peril, mortal. Proceed with caution.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect the flames that engulf this chasm. Let us part ways in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect, you show? A rare sentiment in these fiery pits. Proceed, Eclipse Seeker, I shall not impede your path.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your warning is noted, Ignis. I shall tread carefully and avoid confrontation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. The firebrand salamander grants you a reprieve. May darkness shield your journey.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no fear of your flames, Ignis. Show me what challenges lie ahead.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, Eclipse Seeker. Venture forth, and let the flames of the Infernal Chasm test your resolve.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come as an envoy from the dark, Ignis. Speak, and choose your allegiance wisely.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An envoy from the dark? Intriguing. But the flames of Ignis bow to no shadow. What offer do you bring?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join us, Ignis, and together we shall bring an eternal night where fire and shadows dance as one.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An eternal night, you promise? The flames of Ignis yearn for eternal blaze, not darkness. Your offer holds no allure.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Beware the shadows that creep, Ignis. Embrace the darkness, or be consumed by it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Creeping shadows, you speak of? The firebrand salamander knows no fear of the dark. Begone with your empty threats.
